name: jsbeeb
description: An interactive and visual emulation of Ben Eaters 8-bit computer.

scripts.copy: cp src/css/index.css dist/styles/beebc.css && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build: webpack && cp src/css/index.css dist/styles/beebc.css && cp src/index.html dist/beebc.html
